meaningMnemonic: When <radical>winter</radical> comes your <radical>direction</radical>, the trees must <kanji>release</kanji> their leaves for the coming cold.
readingMnemonic: The trees <kanji>release</kanji> all of their leaves onto your <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう). Slowly, you watch in horror as your home is consumed by the released leaves. They enter in through the windows, doors, and the chimney.
